-MVm9clNlSe1aCWphEHF.title: TAMAGOTCHI
-MVm9clNlSe1aCWphEHF.description: This app is a re-creation of the 90's Tamagotchi. It allows users to take care of a digital pet. The pet can eat, sleep, fight or play. It is perfect for teaching children how to take care of a pet and responsibilities.
-MVm9clNlSe1aCWphEHF.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

-MVmAu0UvlcOJLTn8Xtr.title: BEAR WATCHER
-MVmAu0UvlcOJLTn8Xtr.description: This app allows users to keep track of bears seen in the wild.
-MVmAu0UvlcOJLTn8Xtr.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

-MVmBfirBAQNrGNyX4c7.title: SORTING HAT
-MVmBfirBAQNrGNyX4c7.description: The purpose of the application is to assign a person to one of the four Houses in Harry Potter. Once the user's name is submitted, a card appears with the House name, color and values.
-MVmBfirBAQNrGNyX4c7.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
